name: Nami
text: [On Play] Look at the top 5 cards of your library and reveal up to one {Strawhat Crew} type card other than "Nami" then put it into your hand. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your library and reveal up to one {Strawhat Crew} type card other than "Nami" then put it into your hand. Then, place the rest of the cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.
